title: Jon Masalin
text:
Jon Masalin (born 29 January 1986) is a retired <a href="Finnish%20people">Finnish</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He is currently working as a goalkeeper coach at <a href="Fredrikstad%20FK">Fredrikstad FK</a>.
He was on spells with <a href="Aston%20Villa%20F.C.">Aston Villa</a> and <a href="SC%20Heerenveen">SC Heerenveen</a>, and has later played for Norwegian clubs <a href="Notodden%20FK">Notodden</a> and <a href="HamKam">HamKam</a>, before he joined Fredrikstad in 2010.
